thread.title: Modern, clean, comfortable and convenient hotel.
thread.title_full: Modern, clean, comfortable and convenient hotel. - Review of Fraser Suites Queens Gate, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PV_Traveler_3664
title: Modern, clean, comfortable and convenient hotel.
text: Spent 5 days in a suite at this terrific hotel. The room was modern, clean and quiet, bed was comfortable and the full kitchen included a clothes washer/dryer. Bath was large, clean and had a great shower with thick towels. The staff was always helpful. I was also pleasantly surprised by the variety offered at breakfast (worth the 10 pounds charged if you do not include it in your room). Also liked the central location - within two blocks of the Victoria and Albert and Natural History museums, many good restaurants and two food markets as well as a tube station. The wifi was free and the bandwidth was good. I'll stay here again.
